article_title: Marblehead resident Christopher Stockwell hopes to attract independent voters in 6th District

article_metadata.author: Dustin Luca Staff Writer

og.description: MARBLEHEAD — Independent congressional candidate Chris Stockwell is counting on voters to fire the “shot heard ‘round the nation” on Nov. 4.
